pages.text: $(li)The Charcoal is a variant of the Coal.$(br)$(li)This material can be used as a fuel in Furnaces, Smokers, Blast Furnaces and Kilns.$(br)$(li)One Charcoal can smell up 8 items, so with 8 Charcoals you can smelt 1 complete stack.
$(li)Charcoal can be used to craft Fire Charges, Torchs, Braziers, Charcoal Blocks and Campfires in a Crafting Table too.$(br)$(li)Charcoal can be created smelting any kind of Wood Log in a Furnace.
